<h3>Beef-Wellington</h3>
[](https://s3.amazonaws.com/finecooking.s3.tauntonclud.com/app/uploads/2000/12/19164801/beef-wellington_wide.jpg)
* __INGREDIENTS__
    + _For Pastry_
    + 3 packages (1 lb. each) frozen puff pastry 
    + _For The Mushrooms_  
    + 2 large portabella mushrooms, stems removed
    + 6 Tbs. olive oil; more for cooking
    + 2 cloves garlic, minced
    + 1/2 tsp. fresh thyme leaves, lightly chopped
    + 1/2 tsp. very roughly chopped fresh rosemary
    + Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper
